title: Jesus Camp
description:
This week on True Story, Tig and Cheryl attend Jesus Camp! The 2006 doc arrived at the height of the so-called "culture wars"-- much like the war between Tig and Cheryl re: spilling the beans! Speaking of which: listen to the end of the episode to hear our doc duo hilariously reassure some concerned fans-- Praise be! *this episode spills beans* Get True Story merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
